new-snapshot.title: New snapshot
new-snapshot.description: The snapshot will save the current state of the panel:
new-snapshot.bullet-point2: Position of machines in the flow
new-snapshot.bullet-point3: Position of internal networks in the flow
new-snapshot.note: Note: Snapshot name must be unique
new-snapshot.error-too-short: Snapshot name must be at least 3 characters long.
new-snapshot.error-too-long: Snapshot name must not be longer than 24 characters.
new-snapshot.error-bad-characters: Snapshot names can only include letters, digits and following special characters:

modify-snapshots.title: Modify and delete snapshots
modify-snapshots.description-empty1: To get started, create a new snapshot by clicking the

leaving.title: You're leaving the page
leaving.description: You have unsaved changes that will be permanently lost if you leave this page. Are you sure you want to continue?

unsaved.title: Are you sure?
unsaved.description: Performing this action will discard all current changes. Are you sure you want to continue?

np-restore.title: Confirm restoration
np-restore.description: Performing this action will discard all current changes and revert to the currently active configuration. Are you sure you want to continue?

np-refresh.title: Confirm machines data refresh
np-refresh.description: By refreshing the machines you will discard all unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to continue?
